caller_intent: Wayne wanted to finalize an insurance policy payment with a $10,000 deductible, confirming the premium amount and providing payment details via Discover card.
resolution_steps: Heather confirmed the policy details (premium: $2,165, deductible: $10,000).
Wayne provided Discover card information (number, expiration date, zip code, and name).
Heather acknowledged receipt of payment details and confirmed she would email the receipt.
Heather offered to reassess rates next year and wished Wayne a merry Christmas.
summary: Heather processed Wayne's insurance payment via Discover card after confirming policy details. Wayne provided card information, and Heather committed to emailing the receipt. The conversation concluded with a holiday greeting and a note to reassess rates next year.
